website_summaries.verdict: This air accessory kit includes 25 pieces and a storage case and proves to be a comprehensive and well-organized kit.
pros: Solid set of basic air compressor accessories that work well as a starter
Conveniently includes various adapters and Teflon tape to protect against air leaks
Box to keep items organized is a nice touch
Pieces work well and are of good quality

customer_reviews.title: So many high quality attachments
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set of compressor tools. There are so many attachments and extra connectors. There’s an attachment for every use, and they are all very high quality. I honestly did not expect this quality of a product at this price point. The organizer is a great addition as well. This will have a permanent spot in my garage for as long as I have a compressor.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Doherty

customer_reviews.title: Lacking the basics
customer_reviews.text: It's nothing fancy. I didn't expect a lot. But I did expect it to have everything needed to get started. But the kit only has one coupler end. It's got plenty of inserts and doo dads, but with only one coupler I can't have a hose disconnect and a tool disconnect. And that seems quite silly when you get all this much excess, but not enough of the essentials to get your new hose and tools connected to the compressor.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Ellazar

customer_reviews.title: Starter kit is great for the cost.
customer_reviews.text: Came with plenty of fittings to get started. Was able to use one connector to hook two coil hoses together. The one thing I would change is the air gun tool. I don't like the way the smaller attachments fit into an adaptor, and then that adaptor fits into the gun with no gaskets. Half the air blows out these holes on the sides (See picture). Overall, great buy.
customer_reviews.author: ZumaKyle

customer_reviews.title: Questionable Quality
customer_reviews.text: While this set has many needed connections for your compressor, the quality is just so-so. They appear to be cheaply made and the thread bores appear poorly done. I can see why some people have had leak issues because if you don't wrap the threads on these connections with loads of Teflon tape, you will have leaks. Almost every thread bore appears to be defective in some way. The best part of this set is the case!
customer_reviews.author: thepit47

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BUY
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product it comes packed perfectly and ready to use with minimal instructions needed. All of the pieces are very durable and it has served each and every purpose I needed it to serv.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Air nozzle leaks-No spring or recoil device,so it leaks.
customer_reviews.text: Whew! Cheap! The Air nozzle has no spring or recoil device. I can move it around with a finger. Leaking until you get it set properly. The Pressure check device,I didn’t think this could ever be made cheaper. It is. Disappointing,, thought it looked like quality. Keep on looking.You get what you pay for,Cheap should be cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Good Value!
customer_reviews.text: Good multi purpose kit. I currently use it as a blow gun. It is nice that it comes with various adapters and the Teflon tape. If you plan on using this in a shop you may have to get different air hose adapters. The ones at my work are different fittings than what came in the kit. Great starter kit for starting technicians or someone using it at home. Starting an automotive career is expensive and you need to save money where you can.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob C.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap junk.
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for, so put a few bucks more and put a quality set. This one is exactly what you expect from the price, a cheap piece of junk. First time I used the tire chuck, it got stuck on the valve stem, almost blew up my grandson's bicycle tire, had to disconnect it from the air hose. Then I hooked it back up and it leaked like crazy. Next day I went to air up a tire on my wheelbarrow and the air chuck blew apart in my hand. At least the box is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The diameter of the male quick release plug is a ...
customer_reviews.text: The diameter of the male quick release plug is a little too large, so it doesn't fit well into the trigger's inlet nor the 2 female barrel. The diameter of the two male barrels is okay strangely. Perhaps the trigger and other accessories were not made from a same design, but different "brand" products mixed as a set.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: What You See Is What You Get
customer_reviews.text: Like the Primefit 25 piece set! This is a set of 25 accessories for a air compressor! It has it all, with a nice box to keep things organized! It was also reasonable price compared to competitors! All pieces of set look to be made of heavy duty metals!
customer_reviews.author: WilliamTop Contributor: Country Music

customer_reviews.title: Good kit, but some of the pieces feel delicate
customer_reviews.text: Good kit, but some of the pieces feel delicate. Not superior quality or anything. It's just a good deal. I wish some of the pieces fit better. It's sometimes cumbersome to get a snug fit or get the connections all right. It's like it's missing some transition pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Mack

customer_reviews.title: Good set
customer_reviews.text: Have used most of this set already. I have a lot of air powered tools. Good value rather than buying fittings separately.
customer_reviews.author: Dan E. Schultheis

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift
customer_reviews.text: Came with a bunch of stuff not sure what for but pretty good so far
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Like this https
customer_reviews.text: Some of the cheapest made air kit parts I've ever seen. Does it work, yes, but for how long. I would advise looking at another kit. Like this
customer_reviews.author: Destinee P.

customer_reviews.title: Like the product
customer_reviews.text: This is working out for me good value for the price
customer_reviews.author: Den M

customer_reviews.title: Missing part
customer_reviews.text: Four stars but giving one star only because I didn't receive the adapter that connects the basketball valve to the blowgun
customer_reviews.author: Paul Anthony Dean

customer_reviews.title: Decent, would recommend for budget purchase
customer_reviews.text: The storage case doesn’t make a lot of sense for what is in it but it works well enough to contain parts.
customer_reviews.author: Savana

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Like other reviewers have said
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Like other reviewers have said, those who had pressure problems weren't using the tape properly. Without the tape the nozzles don't work, but works like a charm once you use it.
customer_reviews.author: Minerva

customer_reviews.title: Reasonably priced, fair value
customer_reviews.text: Fair price for a low end set.The set does contain the most commonly u sed attachments. Many of the attachments are very lightweight and probably would be useless after one good knock against anything but I am satisfied with my purchase. If you are looking for occasional,around the house use this set is perfect
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This advertised that it contained the big attachment to blow ...
customer_reviews.text: This advertised that it contained the big attachment to blow up large floaties etc. It did not. But the product was ok
customer_reviews.author: Debra STEWART

customer_reviews.title: Comes with everything you need
customer_reviews.text: I got this one because of the case and reviews. For the price it’s great and I haven’t had a problem as of yet. I suggest using the tape it comes with to seal your connections so air isn’t lost.
customer_reviews.author: JohnLuca

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: The kit worked great for my air compressor and gave me plenty of hardware options to choose from when assembling my air hose application.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Draper

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works fine came with everything . The case is great to have to stay organized
customer_reviews.author: Honest reviews

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent kit, it comes with multiple quick connect adaptors ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent kit, it comes with multiple quick connect adaptors for those with multiple tools. Quality is perfectly fine. Any of the other comments complaining about leak issues are obviously by people who are not using the Teflon tape that comes with the kit...
customer_reviews.author: TFry

customer_reviews.title: Unproffessional use it'll be fine...
customer_reviews.text: So far has been a good product, no fitment issues I expected or poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Allen

customer_reviews.title: Still nice having an extra one though
customer_reviews.text: Ordered because I lost mine but I recovered my older one. Still nice having an extra one though.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: The fittings are fine -- hard to mess that up
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this no stars, I would. The fittings are fine -- hard to mess that up. The smaller inflation tool blew apart when I put it on the compressor. The larger tool is poorly constructed. All of the parts are pretty cheaply made. My mistake, should have known better
customer_reviews.author: Seymor

customer_reviews.title: Regardless of other reviews this set is great, no leaks and no problems
customer_reviews.text: lots of reviews with air leaks, makes me think they either over tightened the ones with the o-rings or didnt use plumbers tape on the others. Regardless of other reviews this set is great, no leaks and no problems.
customer_reviews.author: T. Freese

customer_reviews.title: Quality is decent enough for light home use. Absolutely recommended for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to purchase this due to all the negative reviews describing this as poorly made. Other than the air pressure tester which is incredibly flimsy, the rest of the parts seem to be made well enough and none of the pieces leak after wrapping the included Teflon tape around the threading a few times and tightening with pliers. I can see how you'd want something better for serious construction or industrial use, but for light home use it's perfectly fine.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: I returned this set as I was not impressed with ...
customer_reviews.text: I returned this set as I was not impressed with the quality. For the price and those on a budget, I guess it's O.K. Just not what I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: This kit is an affordable starter set for someone like me who had just purchased his first air compressor
customer_reviews.text: This kit is an affordable starter set for someone like me who had just purchased his first air compressor. The build feels decent. Some of the coating on one of the pieces did flake off a bit but that was only cosmetic. I appreciate how well the quick release pieces work together.
customer_reviews.author: Adono

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very handy set of accessory's balls air mattresses, tires no job to big for it.
customer_reviews.author: Rimma

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good kit with some quality issues
customer_reviews.text: PROs: Good variety of attachments allow for a wide variety of uses Good price, especially when compared to comparable kits CONs; The machining on a few of the fittings is poor. Overall quality is middling.
customer_reviews.author: Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Took a little figuring to understand how all the pieces work together, but they go together, and I have tested them all. Works great! I used teflon tape that I already had opened, but this roll looks to be a quality roll of tape with a standard amount (sometimes you get rolls that give just enough to use with the product).
customer_reviews.author: Kojones

customer_reviews.title: Not a quality product..
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste time on this one. The good part about this kit was it has a good number accessories included, but now on second use it self air is leaking from the tire inflator.
customer_reviews.author: Prasprince

customer_reviews.title: Tons of fun in the garage for inflating auto and bicycle tires ...
customer_reviews.text: Tons of fun in the garage for inflating auto and bicycle tires and beach/pool toys. I also use the assorted nozzles to blow the dust from those pesky little nooks and crannies on the cars dashboards and center consoles ... works like a professional auto detailer's rig.
customer_reviews.author: Aldocella

customer_reviews.title: Nice selection of bits
customer_reviews.text: The air gun arrived with the o-ring inside the valve stuck closed. Once it was broken free everything worked. The female quick connect does not allow you to slide the male fitting right in, you have to pull out on the ring for the male piece to mate. Not a big deal though. Nice selection of bits.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: has it all
customer_reviews.text: all in one nice little case sitting on self above air compressor
customer_reviews.author: Terry B.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good enough for what I needed at the time but not the quality that I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Corcoran

customer_reviews.title: I like this kit
customer_reviews.text: I like this kit. My husband hasn't really commented on it and I think I use it more than he does. I love the different sized ends. No two balls at our house use the same end so this is pretty handy and I like the fact that there is a storage case.
customer_reviews.author: Online Shopping Mom

customer_reviews.title: great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: great value for the money. was looking for just the quick connect adapters but went with this case because of all the added features. worth the money. the quick connect works great. you need to use the supplied plumbers tape.
customer_reviews.author: Doug N

customer_reviews.title: use this on my bostitch 150 psi air tank. ...
customer_reviews.text: use this on my bostitch 150 psi air tank. all the pieces seem well made and have no leaks.
customer_reviews.author: Seraphim

customer_reviews.title: I love this kit
customer_reviews.text: Every thing I need for my small compressor in one kit.
customer_reviews.author: CD

customer_reviews.title: The are 2 tire inflator pieces the long one, ...
customer_reviews.text: The are 2 tire inflator pieces the long one, the rubber gaskets blew out and the other one did more deflating than inflating.
customer_reviews.author: Robert B

customer_reviews.title: Good starter kit
customer_reviews.text: Good starter kit. Fine for use around the house. Do not waste your time if you need them for daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Scooter

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: The tire inflaters do not work. Does not depress the tire valve enough for the air to enter.
customer_reviews.author: Truman J. Cowling

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Everything works well. I use this kit often no leaks
customer_reviews.author: Dylan P.

customer_reviews.title: All around a good starter set
customer_reviews.text: Use this kit nearly weekly. Connect to my air compressor and use the teflon tape to seal the connections. Fill car and bike tires, Use air tools. All around a good starter set.
customer_reviews.author: David S.

customer_reviews.title: I really Cant wait to use this product....
customer_reviews.text: Love it..there is nothing more to say over then looks like a Great product to have and use so we will see
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal!
customer_reviews.text: love it, much better deal than at Lowes or Home Depot, many more attachments for a lower price
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Carol Hays

customer_reviews.title: Quality as Good as Store Kits I've Seen but Less Expensive
customer_reviews.text: This kit seems to be about the same quality I see in retail stores like Home Depot or automotive stores but it's about 50% less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: stevefoobar

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Items were as advertised, and the case fits everything perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Conrad

customer_reviews.title: Everything else in kit is useful and gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: It would have been a more complete kit if it included a tire PSI gauge. Everything else in kit is useful and gets the job done. Bought a tire psi gauge separately from Campbell hausfled MP6000
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Good for small use
customer_reviews.text: Not the best set I've owned. I actually returned this one due to its cheap feel. It's good for maybe very minimal use but metal bits even dent easy. Not very strong.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Not best surface finish, but well worth the price. The tire pressure gauge is cheap like a joke, but the rest work well, after you apply the Teflon tapes to the threads

customer_reviews.title: Compressor kit
customer_reviews.text: Just as described by seller! This kit has everything I need for use with my air compressor.

customer_reviews.title: Good for light home use
customer_reviews.text: They get the job done for the price.. but they are not high end. Good for light use.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Great for every day home use
customer_reviews.text: Great for every day home use. Not going to last in a shop or anything but everything works as advertised with no leaks.

customer_reviews.title: Air it up.
customer_reviews.text: Great for all garages with air tools,has what you need.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon CustomerGMC TOUGH

customer_reviews.title: Works, but cheap craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: The kit is as advertised, but is low-end quality. When I press the air blower lever it feels rough and cheap. It works, but next time I will make the trip to Sears to buy my next one.
customer_reviews.author: Richard L. South

customer_reviews.title: ... little cheap parts but for the $ not a bad
customer_reviews.text: a little cheap parts but for the $ not a bad deal

customer_reviews.title: 👎
customer_reviews.text: Lesson learned: you get what you pay for. Everything feels cheap (because it is) and the tire filling chuck actually let air OUT of my tire 😂

customer_reviews.title: Very well packages and we put it to good use as soon as it arrived
customer_reviews.text: Very well packaged and we put it to good use as soon as it arrived. Good quality and the case keeps everything well contained. A must have.

customer_reviews.title: Nice kit for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice kit for the price, has everything I needed! Only downside is that the PSI measuring tool only reads up to 50 PSI, but that is plenty for most of my tires.
customer_reviews.author: Steven C.

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: The fittings seem ok and there certainly is a good variety. The fittings to air up a tire stick and dont spring back well when you remove them from the tire.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The tip to inflate the ball 🏈 broke on the first use.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit!
customer_reviews.text: This is probably my second favorite thing my wife bought me, after the compressor, of course. These work great and were priced very well.

customer_reviews.title: Storage case is convenient
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift so I didn't actually use the set but it has a great selection of air compressor accessories and the storage case is very handy.

customer_reviews.title: ... tires no problem at all has everything you need sturdy too.
customer_reviews.text: Putting air in your tires no problem at all has everything you need sturdy too.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is worth the price. It even comes with Teflon tape so the connections are air tight.
customer_reviews.author: Lionel G.

customer_reviews.title: ... while now and haven't had a problem everything works perfect
customer_reviews.text: It's not the nicest quality but it's definitely worth the price I've had it for a little while now and haven't had a problem everything works perfect

customer_reviews.title: Many options, great price.
customer_reviews.text: It may not be the best kit ever but the price for the number of pieces you get, it is worth to me.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: These are working great for me
customer_reviews.text: These are working great for me. No leaks. But I doubt I will ever use them very extensively. Great for the price.

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we needed for our air compressor to do what we needed for our RV and around our home

customer_reviews.title: good kit nice to have the case
customer_reviews.text: Great for my occasional air compressor use. Not professional quality, but I didn't pay for it either!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Kits has everything and then some. Seems to be well constructed.

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the price

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good stuff, only wish it came with diagram to help put together but easy enough to put together.

customer_reviews.title: Good kit, no leaks
customer_reviews.text: I've had no problems with this kit. I used most of the fittings after putting on thread tape and I've had no problems with air leaks of any kind. This was a good kit for the price I paid.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. I have used various pieces over the past couple months and have no complaints
customer_reviews.author: Adam Herndon

customer_reviews.title: Okay quality component kit for home mechanic
customer_reviews.text: This kit is a fairly cheap alternative to buying fittings separately. The components are cheap and the longevity of things such as the tire pressure gauge are questionable, but I typically take very good care of my tools and I am sure I can get these to last me for a very long time. I'm a DIY mechanic, so I'm not using these every day. The components in this kit are all pretty basic needs for anyone with a home air compressor. The case is nice to keep everything organized and I've used most of the components with no issues. Very happy with my purchase as it achieved what I needed it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Q.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far, everything works as expected. No complaints here! No fitting issues or leaks!

customer_reviews.title: more affordable package and be just as useful.
customer_reviews.text: Way too many "adapters" that seem to do the same thing as the last one in the package. Technically they are different pieces (different tube lengths, etc) but they effectively do the same thing. Could be consolidated into a smaller, more affordable package and be just as useful.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis & Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Great starter package!
customer_reviews.text: This is not the highest quality kit around, but I don't need that. I needed something functional to air tires and blow air on projects to clean them off. If you're looking for something that's top of the line, don't browse the bargain section. This is a great kit that gives more than most people need in a handy little case. Very happy with it!

product_meta.title: Primefit IK1010S-25 Air Accessory Kit with Storage Case, 25-Piece
product_meta.description:
This 25 piece air accessory kit has all the most commonly used air compressor accessory items, all packed in a durable clear storage case for easy access and organization. Included in the kit are all of the essential items: including a blow gun with 5 different nozzle attachments, 1 steel quick connect coupler, 8 quick connect plugs for a variety of tools, a dual air chuck and ball foot chuck for tire inflation, a tire gauge, 2 sport ball inflation needles, PTFE sealant tape and a variety of air hose connection fittings.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
This 25 piece air accessory kit has all the most commonly used air compressor accessory items, all packed in a durable clear storage case for easy access and organization. Included in the kit are all of the essential items: including a blow gun with 5 different nozzle attachments, 1 steel quick connect coupler, 8 quick connect plugs for a variety of tools, a dual air chuck and ball foot chuck for tire inflation, a tire gauge, 2 sport ball inflation needles, PTFE sealant tape, and a variety of air hose connection fittings.
feature_bullets: 25 essential air accessories in a durable clear storage case for easy access and organization
Includes blow gun w/5 different nozzle attachments
Contains a dual air chuck and ball foot style air chuck for various inflation applications
Includes 1 quick connect coupler, 8 quick connect plugs, pencil tire gauge, 2 inflation needles, PTFE tape, 4 hose fittings
Durable Steel construction with zinc plating for corrosion resistance

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars357 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
